title: 156 - Reconciling Faith and Politics Part 6 - Do We Hate Trump Supporters?
description: This episode was recorded spontaneously in my friend's house while we were on vacation. We captured the audio the best we could. It's still a bit rough. Kevin #1 joins us to discuss some questions about Trump, politics and the process of reconstructing faith.
dc:creator: Voxology
